user.title: Set up Pixels Dice
user.description: Configure the webhook endpoint for your Pixels smart dice.

data_description.webhook_id: The webhook endpoint identifier. Change this only if you need a custom URL.

confirm.title: Webhook Setup Instructions
confirm.description:
Your Pixels dice webhook is ready!

**Webhook URL:**
`{webhook_url}`

Configure your Pixels dice to send roll data to this URL. Each die will automatically appear as a sensor in Home Assistant when it sends its first roll.

Click **Submit** to complete the setup.

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single instance of Pixels Dice is allowed.
